summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the construction of, the main structure of street railway bridge across the West Waterway at West Spokane Street out of the funds provided in, and designating the same as one of the additions, betterments and extensions to the municipal street railway system contemplated by, Ordinance No. 50143, and of a roadway thereon for general traffic purposes out of the funds provided for in and designating the same as one of the general municipal public improvements contemplated by Ordinance No. \_\_\_\_\_\_\_.
